title: Test Modflow - MF2005 Demonstration
description: Comprehensive MODFLOW model demonstration showcasing fundamental FloPy capabilities including model creation, package setup, spatial reference systems, and file I/O operations

packages.purpose: Basic package with inactive cells and starting heads
Heterogeneous hydraulic properties with layered conductivity
Transient pumping wells with seasonal variation
Seasonal recharge with wet/dry season variation
General head boundary representing distant aquifer
Output control for heads and budget files

package_details.LPF: Layer property flow for confined/unconfined layers
package_details.GHB: General head boundary for distant connections
package_details.OC: Output control for heads and budgets

key_features: Comprehensive model creation and validation workflow
Multiple boundary condition types (wells, recharge, GHB)
Spatial reference system with coordinate offsets
Model file I/O and loading validation
learning_objectives: Mastering FloPy package setup and configuration
Configuring model output and solver parameters
Validating model file operations and loading
